name: MIS i2T Young Person IRS
description:
This query will show all reported incidents to IRS from the date selected. Showing case number, type of incident,text,Incident status, if Edited andPrompt for Establishment name. NW
v2.0 This report is for the sole use of Intelligence Directed Placement (NOMS Young Peoples Group)

dataset.name: Incidents
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING_BAH.FIRST_NAME, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TITLE, INITCAP(AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_DESC) AS INCIDENT_TYPE, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TEXT, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID, AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_INCIDENT.LASTEDITEDFLAG, AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TIME, AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE.PARTICIPATION_ROLE_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT AT_INCIDENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_STATUS AT_INCIDENT_STATUS, BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_INCIDENT_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.FACT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY AT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING_BAH, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_TYPE AT_INCIDENT_TYPE WHERE (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK = AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION_ROLE_SK = AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE.INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION_ROLE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_INCIDENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_DATE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.INCIDENT_CASE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IS NULL OR AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING_BAH.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_BED_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_SK = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (((AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE) BETWEEN TO_DATE('07-04-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('07-04-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')))), dataset_ AS (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, INCIDENT_TITLE, INCIDENT_TYPE, INCIDENT_TEXT, INCIDENT_CASE_ID, DAY_DATE, LASTEDITEDFLAG, INCIDENT_STATUS_DESCRIPTION, INCIDENT_TIME, PARTICIPATION_ROLE_DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Incidents Q nd A
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TITLE, INITCAP(AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_DESC) AS INCIDENT_TYPE, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TEXT, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID, AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_INCIDENT.LASTEDITEDFLAG, AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TIME, AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE.PARTICIPATION_ROLE_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.ANSWER_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.QUESTION_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK, AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.INCIDENT_ANSWER_SK, AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.QUESTIONNAIRE_ANS_ID, AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE.RESPONSE_COMMENT_TEXT FROM BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE, BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT AT_INCIDENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_STATUS AT_INCIDENT_STATUS, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_TYPE AT_INCIDENT_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_INCIDENT_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_ANSWER AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_QUESTION AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION, BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION WHERE (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK = AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION_ROLE_SK = AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE.INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION_ROLE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_INCIDENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_DATE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.INCIDENT_CASE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK = AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE.INCIDENT_ANSWER_SK = AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.INCIDENT_ANSWER_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IS NULL OR AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.QUESTIONNAIRE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.QUESTIONNAIRE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (((AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE) BETWEEN TO_DATE('07-04-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('07-04-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')) AND (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK IN (22, 1625, 1526, 1559, 1592) OR AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK IN (1502, 1648, 1649, 1650, 1651) OR AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK IN (1652, 1117) OR AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK IN (681, 1626, 1527, 1560, 1593) OR AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK IN (26, 151, 169, 202, 276, 382, 463, 563, 564, 637, 1623, 1655, 1306, 1453, 1120, 1198, 1265, 1524, 1557, 1590) OR AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK IN (198, 827, 1633, 1534, 1567, 1600) OR AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK IN (1634, 1535, 1568, 1601) OR AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK IN (232, 236, 262, 480, 662, 674, 738, 745, 855, 892, 973, 1635, 1673, 1121, 1536, 1569, 1602) OR AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK IN (21, 37, 71, 214, 256, 360, 599, 928, 1637, 1674, 69, 140, 424, 490, 621, 850, 1122, 1538, 1604)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, INCIDENT_TITLE, INCIDENT_TYPE, INCIDENT_TEXT, INCIDENT_CASE_ID, DAY_DATE, LASTEDITEDFLAG, INCIDENT_STATUS_DESCRIPTION, INCIDENT_TIME, PARTICIPATION_ROLE_DESCRIPTION, ANSWER_DESCRIPTION, QUESTION_DESCRIPTION, INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK, INCIDENT_ANSWER_SK, QUESTIONNAIRE_ANS_ID, RESPONSE_COMMENT_TEXT FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_WHAT_TYPE_OF_ASSAULT_WAS_IT_
field.display: What type of assault was it?
field.legacySql: =If([Incident Question Code] InList(681;1626;1527;1560;1593);[Incident Response Description]) In ([Incident Case Id])

field.name: $ref:V_WHAT_WAS_THE_LOCATION_OF_T39
field.display: What was the location of the incident?
field.legacySql: =If([Incident Question Code] InList(26;151;169;202;276;382;463;563;564;637;1623;1655;1306;1453;1120;1198;1265;1524;1557;1590);[Incident Response Description]) In ([Incident Case Id])

field.name: $ref:V_WERE_ANY_WEAPONS_USED_
field.legacySql: =If([Incident Question Code] InList(198;827;1633;1534;1567;1600);[Incident Response Description]) In ([Incident Case Id])

field.name: $ref:V_DESCRIBE_THE_WEAPONS_USED
field.legacySql: =If([Incident Question Code] InList(1634;1535;1568;1601);[Incident Response Description]) In ([Incident Case Id])

field.name: $ref:V_WERE_ANY_INJURIES_RECEIVED50
field.display: Were any injuries received during the incident?
field.legacySql: =If([Incident Question Code] InList(232;236;262;480;662;674;738;745;855;892;973;1635;1673;1121;1536;1569;1602);[Incident Response Description]) In ([Incident Case Id])

field.name: $ref:V_WAS_A_SERIOUS_INJURY_SUSTA33
field.legacySql: =If([Incident Question Code] InList(21;37;71;214;256;360;599;928;1637;1674;69;140;424;490;621;850;1122;1538;1604);[Incident Response Description]) In ([Incident Case Id])

field.name: $ref:V_DID_THE_ASSAULT_OCCUR_DURI39
field.display: Did the assault occur during a fight?
field.legacySql: =If([Incident Question Code] InList(22;1625;1526;1559;1592);[Incident Response Description]) In ([Incident Case Id])

field.name: $ref:V_WAS_THERE_AN_APPARENT_REAS47
field.legacySql: =If([Incident Question Description] InList("WAS THERE AN APPARENT REASON FOR THE ASSAULT"; "Was there an apparent reason for the assault?"); [Incident Response Additional Comment]) In ([Incident Case Id])

field.name: $ref:V_WHAT_TYPE_OF_DISORDER_INCI42
field.legacySql: =If([Incident Question Description] InList("WHAT TYPE OF DISORDER INCIDENT WAS THIS?"; "What Type Of Disorder Incident Was This?"); [Incident Response Description]) In ([Incident Case Id])
